title: 220: Evolution of Mariota, Penn State's James Franklin
itunes:title: 220: Evolution of Mariota, Penn State's James Franklin
description:
Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks dive into Marcus Mariota's performance following the Titans' 36-22 win over the Colts on Monday Night Football (:40). The guys then explain how the Saints have turned around their defense before they recap College Football Week 7 (13:30). DJ and Bucky cap the show by bringing on Penn State's head coach James Franklin to talk about his star running back, Saquon Barkley (24:50).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
